name: Astrotester
description:
The main character, Dil Sterling, will have to reveal the secret of Astrotesters. Find out the truth about their disappearance, find the preserved relics and become one of them to save your system from destruction.

Features:
- thoughtful levels with a chain of story tasks
- interesting characters and dialogues
- multiple gameplay mechanics: control of equipment (according to the plot), puzzles, cooperation with NPCs, etc.
- unique behavior of each type of enemy, mini bosses
